message:
Add deck publishing backend (database + API)

Backend infrastructure for deck store:
- Database: Add published, author_name, install_count columns to decks
- Database: Add publish/unpublish/increment_install_count functions
- Database: Add get_published_decks() for community store
- Server: Modify GET /api/decks to support ?published=true filter
- Server: Add POST /api/decks/{id}/publish endpoint (toggle)
- Server: Update fork endpoint to increment install_count
- Frontend API: Update listDecks() to support published parameter
- Frontend API: Add publishDeck() function

Publishing design (Option 1):
- When publishing, breaks parent_id chain (deck becomes standalone)
- Prevents fork-of-fork attribution issues
- Warning shown to user before publishing

Remaining frontend UI changes in next commit.
